goal.core.runtime.service.environment

Class LocalMessagingEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.runtime.service.environment.LocalMessagingEnvironment

  • public class LocalMessagingEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object

    Main responsibility of an environment connector is to link the environment (by using the Environment Interface Standard, EIS) to a GOAL MAS.

    Connects an EnvironmentInterfaceStandard to the Messaging system. This is a server, running the EnvironmentInterfaceStandard environment in a separate thread. It enables agents and RSM to connect the environment that runs on top of the Messaging system.

    It allows agents to communicate with the environment via Messages to get percepts and execute actions. DOC/check... And the MonitoringService to manage the environment using Messages.

    To request command execution, construct a EnvOnMsgAction and send it to us. All incoming command requests are strictly serialized by queing them in a BlockingQueue and handling them in incoming order.

    To receive callbacks on environmentListener events, you have to subscribe to us, using the Subscribe command.

    Assumptions: the caller of this server sends messages using a MessageBox that has a MessageBoxId that exactly matches the actual agent's name in EIS. This allows us to use the Message.getSender() as the EIS agent name.

    Author:
    W.Pasman 22mar2012

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalMessagingEnvironment

        public LocalMessagingEnvironment(eis.EnvironmentInterfaceStandard eis,
                         java.lang.String environmentName,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,eis.iilang.Parameter> initialization,
                         MessagingService messagingService)
                          throws GOALLaunchFailureException
        Launch an environment and put it on top of the messaging system. This does call the INIT call but the user may still want to
        • subscribe listeners to environment
        • handle current free entities
        Parameters:
        eis - The interface to connect with the environment.
        environmentName - The name of the environment.
        initialization - Initialization parameters for initializing the environment.
        messagingService - The messaging service used to communicate with clients of environment.
        Throws:
        GOALLaunchFailureException - If environment interface could not be loaded; If connecting to messaging infrastructure failed; If initializing environment failed.
